"Why do you think you haven't been able to finish reading the book? Is it because you're too busy or because you're not enjoying it?"
"Have you tried breaking the book down into smaller chunks and setting a specific time to read each day? This can help you stay on track and make progress more manageable."
"Perhaps the book is too advanced or not challenging enough for your current reading level. Have you considered trying a different genre or level of difficulty?"
"It's possible that you're not fully engaged with the book. Have you tried actively engaging with the text by taking notes, highlighting important parts, or discussing the book with others?"
"Have you considered listening to the book as an audiobook? Sometimes, hearing the story being read aloud can make it easier to focus and stay engaged."
